content.rendered:
Shipping fees will be calculated at the checkout for domestic purchases or Europe.

Our wallpapers ship via UPS ground transportation .
Lead time is approximately 5-7 weeks, as the wallpaper is printed upon order.

Swatches are sent by USPS in the next 3 business days.

If you have any questions or if you are looking for a shipping outside the US and Europe, please contact us, as additional shipping fees will have to be calculated.
